article_title: Dealmakers Q&A: Bass Berry's Page Davidson
article_text:
Dealmakers Q&A: Bass Berry's Page Davidson

Law360, New York (September 4, 2014, 11:22 AM ET) -- J. Page Davidson is a member in the Nashville office of Bass Berry & Sims PLC. Davidson works closely with executives and boards of directors in connection with a variety of corporate and securities matters. In the last 25 years, he has worked with countless companies on complex corporate transactions, such as the leveraged buyout and subsequent initial public offering of a large provider of health care services, at the time the largest LBO in history.



Davidson guides both public and private companies in executing their...

To view the full article, register now.

article_metadata.description: In 2014, we have seen a dramatic increase in the use of representations and warranties insurance not only by buyers addressing traditional concerns but increasingly mandated by private equity sellers seeking a clean exit to disburse proceeds to investors. I think this is a trend that will continue to gain momentum, says Page Davidson of Bass Berry & Sims PLC.
